title: Chocolate Cream Layered Dessert
instructions: Mix flour, butter, and pecans. Press into 9x13 pan. Bake at 350Â° for 15-20 minutes. Cool completely. Beat cream cheese and powdered sugar. Fold in 1 c Cool Whip. Spread over crust. Whisk pudding mixes and milk until thick. Spread over cream cheese layer. Top with remaining Cool Whip and chocolate shavings. Refrigerate 4 hours.
